content: costs to onboard this new model? Consider procurement, IT, legal, security and other cost components. The assessment that is the topic of this chapter is part of such an onboarding process and comes with a cost.  What are the costs of skills development to use this new model effectively? Consider training for administrators, data scientists, risk management and other relevant roles. What are the run costs?  If the model is deployed as SaaS, what are the charges for inferencing? Foundation model inferencing is typically charged by the number of calls to the model and/or the number of tokens processed/generated by the model. Pricing models might differ, as does the amount charged for comparable numbers of calls/tokens.  If the model is deployed in-house, what are the total costs over the foreseeable lifetime of this investment? Consider hardware, electricity, cooling, personnel and all other relevant cost components. These costs will depend on the technical specifications of the
